title: The Call of Cthulhu Article Archive
description:
The Call of Cthulhu Article Archive
===================================

What is this ?
--------------

The intention of this archive is to index and collect in one place every article related to the RPG "Call of Cthulhu" that was published in places not specific to the game itself or the Cthulhu Mythos. Thus it will exclude magazines such as "The Unspeakable Oath" or "Dagon" as it is quite obvious those magazines cater almost exclusively to players of CoC and its variants.

Generally what the archive is focused on is publications that are geared to RPGs in general that included CoC material during their run.

The archive will also not include material that is still available for sale from the publishers at this time ( usually via PDF ) but it will list those articles so users can seek them out themselves.

If you think this list is missing an article reference or can help with scans for the missing articles then please help. Ideally a scan should include the cover of the magazine the article appeared in and all the pages of the article itself.
Get in contact via a message below

Contents
--------
The archive contains completed collections in PDF form for every CoC-related article ever published in the following magazines:
Adventurer Magazine - Mersey Leisure UK
Challenge - GDW
Dragon - TSR US
Imagine - TSR UK
Starry Wisdom - Chaosium (note: not a scan, but reconstructed)
White Dwarf - Games Workshop UK

Incomplete for the following magazines:
Adventures Unlimited - Canadian Magazine
Different Worlds - Chaosium
Ye Book of Tentacles

Missing for the following magazines:
Arcane - Future Publishing UK
Australian Realms
Fantasy Chronicles - Irish Magazine
G.M.
GamesMaster International
The Good Games Guide 1 Winter 85-86 - Games Workshop
Last Province - UK Magazine
Red Giant Magazine
Role Player Independent
UK RPGA's Polyhedron Magazine ( note: not the US version )
Valkyrie
